node.name: The 13th Africa Public Private Partnership Conference
node.description:
The 13th Africa Public Private Partnership Conference, Africa PPP, is in Morocco and under the theme “Accelerating Project Delivery and Partnerships”. Africa PPP is the longest-running PPP conference in Africa hosted annually in both Northern and Southern Africa with key government partnerships. There are many benefits to attending the PPP event: Attendees will leave with improved insights, better strategies and in-hand knowledge that can be implemented into current and future PPP projects.

_x005F_x000D_

 

_x005F_x000D_

This year, Africa PPP features active and upcoming projects in renewable energy, waste to energy, wastewater, bulk water, bulk transport, and infrastructure and spotlights new projects in social service PPP’s. Plus much more; we are once again bringing you everything under 1 roof over just 3 days!

_x005F_x000D_

 

_x005F_x000D_

-Project delivery fundamentals
-Best practice and advanced project structuring delivery panels
-Key-note addresses
-Project showcase sessions
-Unparalleled networking

node.name: Digital Transformation Kuwait
node.description:
With digital transformation as a key pillar for Kuwait Vision 2035, the country is focusing on adopting smart and digital technologies to innovate its services, drive the economy, and improve quality of life, while increasing operational efficiency and performance of key sectors. This goal has pushed for greater investment in Kuwait’s ICT market which is expected to reach 10B USD by 2024 (Global Data).

_x005F_x000D_

Whether it is providing access to accurate data, easier and timely communication with customers, efficient services, or informed decision making, digitalization can transform how governments and companies run their operations and services. However, to achieve digitalization goals and launch new smart services and platforms, stakeholders need to overcome critical challenges including system and data integration, cultural and behavioral adaptation to new technologies, data storage capacity, and cyber threats.

_x005F_x000D_

In collaboration with the Central Agency for Information Technology – CAIT, the Digital Transformation Kuwait Conference is hosted on 2-3 November 2022, to provide a national platform for Kuwait’s digitalization stakeholders and ICT experts, game changers, and leading international solution providers and consultants to discuss the latest plans and innovations in the country’s digital transformation journey, global best practices, and innovative solutions to overcome challenges faced and ensure a successful and secure digitalization.

node.name: ConvenciÃ³n Internacional de Seguros 2022
node.description:
The insurance sector, as a fundamental actor in the development of the country, has the responsibility to identify and open public discussion on the issues of greatest interest to Colombians. 

_x005F_x000D_

Year after year, the Convention reaches all areas of the insurance sector in Colombia, Latin America, Europe, and various parts of the world. It is the perfect space to open business relationships with the different players in the industry and close commercial and professional ties between the participants.

_x005F_x000D_


We invite you to join us in this academic event that the union holds annually and that brings together the entire insurance industry in Colombia and the world, providers in the sector, the media, supervisory and regulatory agencies, and the government, around issues of interest for the sector in general that impact the development of Colombia.

node.name: Saudi Maritime Congress 2022
node.description: In its 3rd edition, the Saudi Maritime Congress will welcome senior professionals from regional and international maritime, shipping, and logistics communities. Meet, network, and do business with over 50 leading exhibitors representing main sectors of the maritime industry.

node.name: Gold Silver Latin America
node.description: The Gold and Silver Latin America International Congress and Exhibition is the professional platform for top-level networking of key gold and silver mining enterprises, investment projects owners and initiators, investors, regulatory authorities, government, and leading technology and equipment suppliers.

node.name: Lithium Latin America
node.description: Congress and Exhibition "Lithium Latin America" is the only international professional platform for top-level networking of key industrial lithium producing enterprises, regulatory authorities, government, technology and equipment suppliers, and investors across Latin America, the US, Canada and Europe.

node.name: Colombia Oil & Gas
node.description: International Congress and Exhibition Colombia Oil and Gas is an international, professional platform, bringing together flagship oil and gas companies from Latin America and world suppliers for the industry. “Colombia Oil And Gas 2022” Business Congress enables to continue networking, share ideas and experience, work out anti-crisis solutions.

node.name: Project Qatar 2022
node.description:
THE REGION’S “TOP PERFORMER” WITH A LEGACY OF SUPPORTING THE CONSTRUCTION COMMUNITY IN QATAR
_x005F_x000D_

Returning this year for its 18th edition, Project Qatar, the International Construction Technology and Building Materials Exhibition, contributes to Qatar’s dynamic building industry with its solid investments and tremendous trading capacity, removing any barriers between investors, suppliers and important proprietors and purchasers in Qatar. Bolstered by 17 years of experience in the Qatari market, Project Qatar is the biggest and most comprehensive construction business platform. The exhibition attracts leading brands from around the world and connects industry professionals to high-ranking decision makers in Qatar, making way for lucrative partnerships and agreements.

node.name: Ecuador Open for Business 2022
node.description: Ecuador's Untapped Mining Potential - Roundtable at PDAC
